cards.rules_text:
Reach
Each nonland noncreature card in your hand without foretell has foretell. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile or a permanent enters the battlefield under your control from exile, put a frostbite counter on up to one target creature.
Creatures with frostbite counters get -X/-0 and can't block, where X is their base power.

Ascend [i](If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {U}{U}{R}{R}. When you do, create four colorless artifact tokens named Lotus Trap with “[i]Alert[/i] — Whenever a triggered ability of a permanent an opponent controls triggers for the first time each turn, sacrifice this artifact. When you do, it deals 1 damage to any target.”
As long as you have the city's blessing, whenever a source you control would deal damage, it deals 4 damage instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Art requires a certain... cruelty.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Zaahen deals lethal damage to another creature, create a black Darkin Equipment artifact token named [/i][i]Corrupted[/i][i] Form with “Equipped creature gets power and toughness equal to the power plus 1 and toughness plus 1 of the exiled creature” and “Equip—Pay 2 life” and that token exiles that creature instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“My kin, show me you deserve to stand.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{WU}: Switch K'Sante's power and toughness until end of turn.
As long as K'Sante's power is greater than his toughness, creatures you control have first strike.
As long as K'Sante's toughness is greater than his power, creatures you control have vigilance.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“K'Sante. Hear my name, and know my strength.” [/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Alert[/i] — Whenever a triggered ability of a permanent an opponent controls triggers for the first time each turn, sacrifice this artifact. When you do, it deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Smile! Everyone is watching!” — Jhin[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets power and toughness equal to the power plus 1 and toughness plus 1 of the exiled creature.
Equip—Pay 2 life
cards.flavor_text: [i]The fallen god-warriors entombed in these weapons could not be easily defeated, and so instead were contained.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Baron Nashor enters or a token enters the battlefield under your control, manifest dread, except it's a Horror in addition to its other types.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control for each token that entered under your control this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]His barony is rather small. Just large enough to accommodate only him, really.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Trample, double strike, haste
When Scourge of the Stars enters, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Starsurge enters or a creature you control deals lethal damage to another permanent, draw two cards then discard a card.
{3}{R}{R}: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target permanent.

Kicker—{B} [i](You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Vile Feast deals 1 damage to target creature and you gain 1 life. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 black Spider creature token.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider.” — Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Other Spiders you control have menace.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She loves them all. She just loves this one more.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a spider you control deals lethal damage or destroys another permanent, create a 1/1 black Spider creature token.
When Arachnoid Host attacks, spiders you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Spiders you control have reach, deathtouch, and lifelink.
Whenever Elise enters or transforms, create a 1/1 black Spider creature token.
{1}{B}: Transform Elise and draw a card. Activate only if a creature you control died this turn and only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I hear a man likes a lady with legs.”[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Reach, deathtouch, and lifelink
Elise cannot be blocked by more than one non-Spider creature.
[i]Last hit[/i] — Whenever this creature deals lethal damage to another permanent, you gain life equal to the damage dealt and create a tapped 1/1 black Spider creature token.
{B}{R}, Sacrifice a creature you control: Elise deals 1 damage to target creature. Transform Elise. Activate only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]“Only the spider is safe in her web.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Trample, haste
When Vilemaw enters or attacks, destroy target non-Spider creature.
Whenever a creature dies, create two 1/1 black Spider creature tokens.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Its altars may lie dormant, its paths may seem untrod / But in the dark still skitters, the beast that fools forgot.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, that player mills a card.
{4}{B}, Exile target card from a graveyard: Target opponent loses life equal to its mana value.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Little dream… Where have you gone?” — Lillia[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 if an opponent controls a Wizard or Shaman.”
{T}: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to the difference between Luxanna's power and base power on target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I think you could use some brightening up!” [/i]

cards.rules_text:
Spells you control have trample.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I see it now. The corruption behind the Progress. I had hoped it wouldn't come to this… but perhaps compromise is no longer an option. No matter, my countermeasures are already in place.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Creatures you control have lacerate 1 for each +1/+1 counter on Ambessa. [i](Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature or player, that creature or player gains a bleed counter.)[/i]
Whenever a nonland card enters an opponent's graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Ambessa.

When Ekko enters, you may return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When Ekko leaves the battlefield, each player may put a creature card from their graveyard or they own in exile onto the battlefield under their control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Tomorrow's the last of my worries.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature.
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks while this card is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{W}. When you do, return this card to the battlefield tapped and attacking.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a copy of target creature you control, except it's a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?” — Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier[/i]
